contact-popover.title: Contact us
contact-popover.text-part-1: To answer your questions or to get information about ongoing projects, write to us at the email address:

home.mission-text: To promote the sustainable development of Schefferville and its region by partnering on projects in the areas of housing, economic development, and community and cultural life.

newsletter.intro-text: The newsletter will present project updates, good news, and upcoming community and cultural activities. It will be published every two months or immediately following significant news.
newsletter.download-text: You can view and download all newsletters below.

housing.intro-text: Housing is at the heart of community and economic development. We have a bank of land to meet your needs. We are working on a project for affordable housing and the revitalization of the Eclipse neighborhood. Share your needs with us, and we will assist you.
housing.page-text: Are you looking to rent a home? We have a few residential properties available. Are you searching for land to build on? We have a bank of land available. In both cases, do not hesitate to contact us!

business.intro-text: Do you have a business project in mind? Are you looking to start a social economy enterprise, learn about the resources and services available in Schefferville, or find out more about mining projects? Are you searching for a site for your business? We invite you to explore this section or contact us.
business.project-text: Do you want to start a project, activity, or initiative? Let us know. Our extensive experience in project management and development, combined with a network of contacts and funding partners, will help you achieve your goals. We assure you that discussions will remain confidential. If you are at the pre-feasibility stage, send us a project summary for discussion. If your business plan is ready, submit it to us for validation and to ensure you receive financial assistance according to the rules set by financial partners. Remember that once a project is started, it is difficult to request funding.

communal-life.communal-life-alt: Recreation, community and cultural life, healthy habits
communal-life.intro-text: We aim to enrich the offerings for citizens in terms of recreation, sports, outdoor activities, cultural and community activities, and healthy living habits. Activities are underway; perhaps you want to start a project or learn about available and developing facilities.
communal-life.intro-text-follow-up: For more details, click on the activities marked with the icon

corporation.intro-text: The Corporation de développement de Schefferville is a non-profit paramunicipal organization whose members are primarily appointed by the City of Schefferville. The Innu nations of Matimekush-Lac-John and Kawawachikamach also appoint representatives.
corporation.intro-text-follow-up: In addition to information about the corporation and its members, you will find several public documents concerning the corporation in the Documents tab.
corporation.documents-text: You will find here the public documents of the Corporation de développement de Schefferville. For any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
corporation.general-assembly-text: The members' assembly consists of representatives from the Innu nation of Matimekush-Lac John, the Naskapi nation of Kawawachikamach, and the City of Schefferville.
corporation.board-of-directors-text: The board of directors is composed of seven members representing the three communities. Three seats are reserved for each development area.
